TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509CertificateInitiatorClientCredential extends System.Object

Docs.summary: クライアントが自身を識別するために使用する証明書を定義します。
クライアントへの通信時にサービスを表すために使用する証明書を取得または設定します。
Docs.value: クライアントへの通信時にサービスを表すために使用する 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 When the first call is made on the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] proxy, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> are made read\-only. Subsequently calling the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** method results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
## 例

Docs.exception: 資格情報が読み取り専用のときに メソッドが使用されました。

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCertificate (string subjectName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetCertificate(string subjectName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName) cil managed

Docs.param: サービスがサービス証明書を取得するときに使用する証明書ストアの場所。
開く X.509 証明書ストアの名前を指定します。
Docs.summary: サブジェクト識別名を指定して、サービスを表すために使用する証明書を指定します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 For more information on the **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** parameter, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.SubjectName%2A>.
Values for **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine \(default\).
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user.
If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>. If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
Values for **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
## 例 The following code specifies the certificate to use.
[!code-csharp[c\_TcpClient\#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_tcpclient/cs/source.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCertificate (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetCertificate(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue) cil managed

Docs.param: クライアントがクライアント証明書を取得するときに使用する証明書ストアの場所。
開く X.509 証明書ストアの名前を指定します。
実行する X.509 検索の種類を定義します。
X.509 証明書ストアで検索する値。
Docs.summary: 、、、 などのクエリ パラメーターを指定して、クライアントを表すために使用する証明書を指定します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Values for **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine \(default\).
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user.
If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>. If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
Values for **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
Values for **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> enumeration.
The most commonly used enumeration is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName>, which does a case\-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. This can be an imprecise search. If more than one certificate is returned then the first one matching the find is used to represent the client.
## 例 The following code specifies the certificate to use.
[!code-csharp[c\_TcpClient\#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_tcpclient/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c\_TcpClient\#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_tcpclient/vb/source.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: サービスを表すために使用する証明書を指定します。
